comments.body:
Just to double-check
Your metadata does not contain information about those packages, just 
```
    - ipywidgets >=7.0.0
    - networkx
```
and it would be nice to add the python constrains to the metadata as well :)
What do you mean by the metadata does not contain information about those packages?

If you try to recover the metadata from pypi or from your setup it will not contain those packages as dependency, just those which I mentioned
Please see
https://pypi.org/pypi/ipycytoscape/json

and in the ``setup.py``
https://github.com/QuantStack/ipycytoscape/blob/master/setup.py#L88-L90

You can add a ``python_requires=">=3.0"`` to the ``setup.py`` and it will add that information to the metadata regarding the constrains about python

I just create a recipe using [grayskull](https://github.com/marcelotrevisani/grayskull/) and I was checking those things :smile:
